perks.name: Action Boy/Girl
perks.description: Your character knows how to make the most out of every moment. For each rank of this perk, the character gets an additional Action Point each combat turn.

perks.name: Adrenaline Rush
perks.description: You have a fear of death that allows you to fight harder when you are wounded. When your character's HP drop below 50% of their maximum, your character gains a +1 Strength bonus, but cannot go above the racial maximum.

perks.name: Animal Friend
perks.description: Your character spends a lot of time with animals. A LOT of time. Animals will not attack one of their friends, unless the animal is threatened or attacked first.
perks.effect: Wild animals will not attack you

perks.name: Awareness
perks.description: You know exactly what is going on in combat. This perk gives you more information when you examine a critter. You can see their exact number of hit points and the weapon they are armed with, if any.
perks.effect: More information when examining a critter

perks.name: Bend the Rules
perks.description: With this perk, the next time your character gets to choose a perk, they can ignore all restrictions except for race. You rule!
perks.effect: Next perk ignores all restrictions (except for race)

perks.name: Better Criticals
perks.description: Your shots somehow hurt more than usual. The critical hits you cause in combat are more devastating. When you do a critical hit that does not kill outright, your hit does 150% normal damage (in addition to any damage bonuses already gained). In addition, your chance to cause damage to a limb is increased by 50%. If you critically hit for 40 points of damage, for instance, you would instead deal a whopping 60 points. OUCH!.
perks.requirement: Mutants cannot choose this perk. Perception 6, Luck 6,Agility 4, Level 9.

perks.name: Bluff Master
perks.description: You are the king or queen of smooth talking. Whenever you are caught stealing, your character can automatically talk his or her way out of the situation.
perks.effect: Talk your way out of being caught stealing

perks.name: Bone Head
perks.description: You have a very thick skull, just like your mother always told you. With the first rank of this perk, you get a 50% chance to avoid being knocked unconscious. With the second rank, that chance increases to 75%.
perks.effect: 50% chance to avoid being knocked unconscious, 75% at rank 2

perks.name: Bonsai
perks.description: Through careful nurturing, you have a small fruit tree growing out of your head. Now you have a steady supply of fruit!
perks.effect: Fruits start growing in your head
perks.requirement: Only Ghouls can choose this perk. Outdoorsman 50%, Science 40%, Level 12

perks.name: Bonus HtH Attacks
perks.description: Your character has watched Jackie Chan and Bruce Lee and managed to learn a thing or two. Your character can make more hand-to-hand or melee style attacks per combat turn with this perk. The AP cost to use a HtH or Melee attack is reduced by 1.
perks.effect: Melee and Unarmed attacks cost -1 AP

perks.name: Bonus HtH Damage
perks.description: You have learned a special technique to deal more damage with your fists and melee weapons. Your character gains a +2 bonus to Melee Damage for each level of this perk.

perks.name: Bonus Move
perks.description: You have learned to take longer strides in combat. For each level of this perk, your character can move 2 more hexes in combat. The first two hexes a character moves do no cost any APs.

perks.name: Bonus Ranged Damage
perks.description: You know just where to hit to make it hurt more. Every bullet that successfully hits the target does +2 damage for each rank of this perk.

perks.name: Bonus Rate of Fire
perks.description: Your trigger finger is a little faster than normal. Each ranged weapon attack costs one less AP to perform.

perks.name: Bracing
perks.description: You know how to brace large weapons while you are standing. When applicable, you get a bonus for using a tripod just by holding a weapon in your hands.
perks.effect: Same bonus as tripod while holding weapons while standing

perks.name: Break the Rules
perks.description: When you choose this perk, you may choose any perk next time, regardless of requirements or race.
perks.effect: Next time chose any perk (race doesnt matter)

perks.name: Cancerous Growth
perks.description: The radiation has mutated you so badly that you thrive in the wastes. You gain a +2 bonus to your healing rate, and can regenerate a crippled limb in 48 hours.
perks.effect: +2HR and regenerate crippled limbs in 48 hours
perks.requirement: Only Ghouls can choose this perk. Strength < 7, Level 6

perks.name: Cautious Nature
perks.description: Your character has learned to be wary of the world around him. His Perception is increased by +3 when determining where he begins in random encounters.
perks.effect: +3 PE to when determining random encounters

perks.name: Comprehension
perks.description: Looks like all those study skills courses paid off. With this perk, your character gains 50% to the number of skill points earned when reading educational books. Books that normally give you 10 skill points now give you 15.
